keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map gf LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map af LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map gp togglePinTab
map gm toggleMuteTab
map J previousTab
map K nextTab
map w nextFrame
map R reload hard
searchEngines:
bd: https://www.baidu.com/s?wd=%s Baidu
bg: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s&ensearch=1 Bing
bl: https://search.bilibili.com/all?keyword=%s Bilibili
cd: https://www.bing.com/dict/search?mkt=zh-CN&q=%s BingDict
co: https://www.collinsdictionary.com/english/%s Collins
dg: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
gg: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
sh: http://symbolhound.com/?q=%s SymbolHound
tr: https://www.microsofttranslator.com/bv.aspx?from=&to=zh-CHS&a=%s Miscosoft Web Translator
wk: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
yh: https://search.yahoo.com/search?q=%s Yahoo
